entry.title: Terms and Conditions
entry.summary:
Author: Astrea_Stars

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,634Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: The place looked different in winter. Softer, somehow. The stone wasn’t any less intimidating, but the warm light spilling from the windows took the edge off it. Wayne Manor smelled like pine and something baking, decorated in layers—glass ornaments higher up, sturdier ones lower. Paper snowflakes, construction-paper bats, uneven lights, all of it warm and deliberate. Dinner was loud. Arguments overlapped. Plates were passed. Someone stole his roll. Someone else stole it back. The threats came quietly, efficiently, and without malice. Clear enough to understand, brief enough not to linger. Dessert was served anyway. Outside, snow continued to fall. Inside, the house hummed—voices overlapping, lights blinking, and the TV’s quiet noises. And despite the threat still ringing sharp and clear in his bones, Hal thought— Yeah. This was worth it.

entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,097Chapters: 2/6Kudos: 334

Summary: Batman doesn't have a favourite. He's not the type. He has never had a favourite—even among his own horde of children. Or so he thinks. Because that is a blatant lie. entry.title: They Started It!!! (A Story On How to Piss Off Five Children and Seduce Their Father by Hal Jordan)
entry.summary:
Author: RegretsEverything

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,766Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 412

Summary: “My dad says adult bodies can’t survive on Red Bull and cereal alone. Do you even know how to cook rice, Mr. Jordan? Is your tummy okay?” Hal Jordan’s stomach is fine. His pride is not. For reasons known only to the universe at large, the Wayne kids have decided that bullying Hal is their newest hobby. In their under-twelve years of wisdom, they’ve concluded he is too single, too lonely, and way too funny when flustered. Hal tries to ignore them… until one day he snaps and fires back the pettiest way possible: He starts flirting with their dad. ----------------- Or Hal has beef with literal preschoolers as a literal adult man. The Wayne kids bully a full ass adult because he is an easy target and gives top tier reactions. Then they completely lose their minds when Hal turns around and seduces their dad. ----------------- No powers au. Neighbors au. Bruce isn't Batman. Hal isn't Green Lantern. The batkids are still menaces, though.

entry.title: To cage a star
entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 129,174Chapters: 36/64Kudos: 915

Summary: "Excuse me, um... I need to find someone, would you- would you mind helping me?"The lady who is asked is an old woman at a bus stop, with a warm expression on her face. "Yes, dear, who are you looking for?" "Um..." The little girl in the pale green dress reaches for her small purse and pulls out a carefully kept piece of paper to give the old lady. "His name is written on the back..." "And who may this person be to you, dear?" "My dad... Mom said Mr. Bruce Wayne is my dad."

entry.title: You Promised I Was Safe With You
entry.summary:
Author: Astrea_Stars

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,103Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 74

Summary: Bruce lied to protect him.He altered the mission route, thinking it would keep Hal safe — but instead, it led him straight into danger. When Hal nearly dies, the truth unravels not through confession, but in the silence, in the hesitation, in the pattern of a man who always plans three steps ahead.Hal trusted Bruce — not just with his life, but with his heart. And when the truth comes out, it’s not the trap that breaks him. It’s the betrayal.The heartbreak.The realization that Bruce didn’t trust him enough to choose his own fate.And Bruce?He thought love meant protection.He thought he could carry the burden of risk alone.But love without trust is just control in disguise.And Hal won’t stay where he isn’t trusted.

Summary: In this world where almost everyone is born with a soulmark that writes the first sentence your soulmate says to you, many, many have expected Damian's soulmark to be something… fancy, gaudy, and pretentious, even.But then again, nothing is crueler than fate and love, after all.Damian was born with a soulmark on his left chest, right on his heart, written in the colour of gold (of course, it is gold).The soulmark reads.[Hey, that's my chips!]Yes.What an anti-climax. A disappointment, even.
